content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "write_to_file" command to add detailed information about the best time to kayak in Norway to my "norway_kayaking.txt" file. The information includes the recommended summer months and my plan to research transportation, lodging, and equipment rental options and create a detailed itinerary for my trip. The command successfully wrote. I used the "google" command to search for flight and ticket options to Norway. The search returned multiple websites including Expedia, Skyscanner, and Norwegian Airlines. There are also new direct flights from the US to Norway launching this summer.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.skyscanner.com/flights-to/no/cheap-flights-to-norway.html", "question": "What are the cheapest flight options to Norway?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Skyscanner offers customized flight options to Norway, including information on airlines, flight duration, and availability. The text provides tips on finding cheap flights to Norway, such as using the Skyscanner tool to compare prices, setting up price alerts, and considering nearby airports. Skyscanner also offers hotel and car rental options in Norway and allows users to compare flights to other destinations.\n\nLinks: ['Podmínkách využívání souborů cookies (https://www.skyscanner.cz/media/zasady-cookie)', 'Předvolby pro soubory cookies (https://www.skyscanner.com/privacy-settings)', 'Skyscanner (https://www.skyscanner.com/)', 'Nápověda (https://help.skyscanner.net/hc/cs?skyCurrency=currency_czk&skyLanguage=lang_cz&skyMarket=cz_skyscanner)', 'Lety (https://www.skyscanner.cz/lety)']", type='action_result')]
"""
